snippet: The company said it would start pursuing other options if a union did not vote to ratify a proposed contract extension by Wednesday.
abstract: Boeing threatens to consider locations besides Washington State to assemble its new 777X jets after union leader sharply criticizes terms of tentative labor deal; company says it will start pursuing other options if union does not vote to ratify proposed contract extension by deadline.
lead_paragraph: The company said it would start pursuing other options if a union did not vote to ratify a proposed contract extension by Wednesday.

headline.main: Boeing Warns Washington State Could Lose 777X if Labor Deal Is Rejected
headline.print_headline: Boeing Warns Washington State Could Lose 777X if Labor Deal Is Rejected

keywords.value: International Assn of Machinists and Aerospace Workers
keywords.name: organizations
